text: The Chosen is a 1981 American drama movie directed by Jeremy Kagan and was based on the novel of the same name by Chaim Potok. It stars Rod Steiger, Maximilian Schell, Robby Benson, Barry Miller, Ron Rifkin, Lonny Price, Jeff Marcus, John Pankow and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jeremy Kagan Category:Movies set in Brooklyn Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies about Jews and Judaism Category:Movies about Orthodox and Hasidic Jews
